    8   /* Include Files */
    9   #include "rt_nonfinite.h"
   10   #include "kalman_filter_lr.h"
   11   #include "d_line_point.h"
   12   #include "eye.h"
   13   #include "mrdivide.h"
   14   #include "messmatrix_new.h"
   15   #include "projectPoints.h"
   16   
   17   /* Function Definitions */
   18   
   19   /*
   20    * % linke Seitenlinie
   21    * Arguments    : double r[10]
   22    *                const double A[100]
   23    *                double Pk[100]
   24    *                const double Q[100]
   25    *                double R_fakt
   26    *                double delta
   27    *                const double xl[10]
   28    *                const double yl[10]
   29    *                const double xr[10]
   30    *                const double yr[10]
   31    * Return Type  : void
   32    */
   33   void kalman_filter_lr(double r[10], const double A[100], double Pk[100], const
   34                         double Q[100], double R_fakt, double delta, const double
   35                         xl[10], const double yl[10], const double xr[10], const
   36                         double yr[10])
   37   {
   38     double yp[10];
   39     double xp[10];
   40     double P[30];
   41     int i;
   42     double D[30];
   43     int m;
   44     double dist_point;
   45     double a;
   46     double b_P[2];
   47     double c_P[2];
   48     double b_xl[2];
   49     double unusedU1[2];
   50     double Hl[200];
   51     double zl[20];
   52     double zml[20];
   53     double d_P[2];
   54     double e_P[2];
   55     double b_xr[2];
   56     double Hr[200];
   57     double zr[20];
   58     double zmr[20];
   59     double H[400];
   60     double R[1600];
   61     double b_A[100];
   62     int i2;
   63     double b_Pk[400];
   64     double K[400];
   65     double b_H[1600];
   66     double b_zl[40];
   67     double b_zml[40];
   68     double c_zl[40];
   69     double b_a[100];
   70     double c_a[100];
   71     projectPoints(r, delta, 0.38, xp, yp);
   72   
   73     /* Punkte von Mittellinie nach links projizieren */
   74     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
   75       P[i] = xp[i];
   76       P[10 + i] = yp[i];
   77       P[20 + i] = 0.0;
   78     }
   79   
   80     for (i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
   81       D[i] = 10000.0;
   82     }
   83   
   84     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
   85       for (m = 0; m < 10; m++) {
   86         dist_point = P[i] - xl[m];
   87         a = P[10 + i] - yl[m];
   88         dist_point = sqrt(dist_point * dist_point + a * a);
   89         if (dist_point < D[20 + m]) {
   90           D[m] = 1.0 + (double)i;
   91           D[10 + m] = 0.0;
   92           D[20 + m] = dist_point;
   93         }
   94   
   95         if (1 + i > 1) {
   96           b_P[0] = P[i - 1];
   97           b_P[1] = P[i + 9];
   98           c_P[0] = P[i];
   99           c_P[1] = P[10 + i];
  100           b_xl[0] = xl[m];
  101           b_xl[1] = yl[m];
  102           d_line_point(b_P, c_P, b_xl, &dist_point, &a, unusedU1);
  103           if ((dist_point < D[20 + m]) && (a > 0.0) && (a < 1.0)) {
  104             D[m] = 1.0 + (double)i;
  105             D[10 + m] = a;
  106             D[20 + m] = dist_point;
  107           }
  108         }
  109       }
  110     }
  111   
  112     /*  Messpunkte ausfiltern, die vor dem letzten pr채dizierten Punkt liegen */
  113     /*  ind = ((D(:, 1) == numel(r) & D(:, 2) == 0) | D(:, 3) > 0.5); */
  114     /*  xl(ind) = []; */
  115     /*  yl(ind) = []; */
  116     /*  D(ind, :) = []; */
  117     /*  Messmatrix, Mess- und Erwartungsvektor bauen */
  118     messmatrix_new(P, r, delta, *(double (*)[10])&D[0], *(double (*)[10])&D[10],
  119                    Hl);
  120     for (i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
  121       zl[i] = 0.0;
  122       zml[i] = 0.0;
  123     }
  124   
  125     i = 0;
  126     for (m = 0; m < 10; m++) {
  127       zl[i] = xl[m];
  128       zl[i + 1] = yl[m];
  129       if (D[10 + m] > 0.0) {
  130         zml[i] = P[(int)(D[m] - 1.0) - 1] + D[10 + m] * (P[(int)D[m] - 1] - P[(int)
  131           (D[m] - 1.0) - 1]);
  132         zml[i + 1] = P[(int)(D[m] - 1.0) + 9] + D[10 + m] * (P[(int)D[m] + 9] - P
  133           [(int)(D[m] - 1.0) + 9]);
  134       } else {
  135         zml[i] = P[(int)D[m] - 1];
  136         zml[i + 1] = P[(int)D[m] + 9];
  137       }
  138   
  139       i += 2;
  140     }
  141   
  142     /* % rechte Seitenlinie */
  143     projectPoints(r, delta, -0.38, xp, yp);
  144   
  145     /* Punkte von Mittellinie nach rechts projizieren */
  146     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
  147       P[i] = xp[i];
  148       P[10 + i] = yp[i];
  149       P[20 + i] = 0.0;
  150     }
  151   
  152     for (i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
  153       D[i] = 10000.0;
  154     }
  155   
  156     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
  157       for (m = 0; m < 10; m++) {
  158         dist_point = P[i] - xr[m];
  159         a = P[10 + i] - yr[m];
  160         dist_point = sqrt(dist_point * dist_point + a * a);
  161         if (dist_point < D[20 + m]) {
  162           D[m] = 1.0 + (double)i;
  163           D[10 + m] = 0.0;
  164           D[20 + m] = dist_point;
  165         }
  166   
  167         if (1 + i > 1) {
  168           d_P[0] = P[i - 1];
  169           d_P[1] = P[i + 9];
  170           e_P[0] = P[i];
  171           e_P[1] = P[10 + i];
  172           b_xr[0] = xr[m];
  173           b_xr[1] = yr[m];
  174           d_line_point(d_P, e_P, b_xr, &dist_point, &a, unusedU1);
  175           if ((dist_point < D[20 + m]) && (a > 0.0) && (a < 1.0)) {
  176             D[m] = 1.0 + (double)i;
  177             D[10 + m] = a;
  178             D[20 + m] = dist_point;
  179           }
  180         }
  181       }
  182     }
  183   
  184     /*  Messpunkte ausfiltern, die vor dem letzten pr채dizierten Punkt liegen */
  185     /*  ind = ((D(:, 1) == numel(r) & D(:, 2) == 0) | D(:, 3) > 0.5 ); */
  186     /*  xr(ind) = []; */
  187     /*  yr(ind) = []; */
  188     /*  D(ind, :) = []; */
  189     /*  Messmatrix, Mess- und Erwartungsvektor bauen */
  190     messmatrix_new(P, r, delta, *(double (*)[10])&D[0], *(double (*)[10])&D[10],
  191                    Hr);
  192     for (i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
  193       zr[i] = 0.0;
  194       zmr[i] = 0.0;
  195     }
  196   
  197     i = 0;
  198     for (m = 0; m < 10; m++) {
  199       zr[i] = xr[m];
  200       zr[i + 1] = yr[m];
  201       if (D[10 + m] > 0.0) {
  202         zmr[i] = P[(int)(D[m] - 1.0) - 1] + D[10 + m] * (P[(int)D[m] - 1] - P[(int)
  203           (D[m] - 1.0) - 1]);
  204         zmr[i + 1] = P[(int)(D[m] - 1.0) + 9] + D[10 + m] * (P[(int)D[m] + 9] - P
  205           [(int)(D[m] - 1.0) + 9]);
  206       } else {
  207         zmr[i] = P[(int)D[m] - 1];
  208         zmr[i + 1] = P[(int)D[m] + 9];
  209       }
  210   
  211       i += 2;
  212     }
  213   
  214     /* % beide Linien kombinieren */
  215     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
  216       memcpy(&H[40 * i], &Hl[20 * i], 20U * sizeof(double));
  217       memcpy(&H[20 + 40 * i], &Hr[20 * i], 20U * sizeof(double));
  218     }
  219   
  220     /*  H = Hl; */
  221     /*  z = zl; */
  222     /*  zm =zml; */
  223     /*  H = Hr; */
  224     /*  z = zr; */
  225     /*  zm =zmr; */
  226     /* % KALMAN FILTER     */
  227     /*  r = A*r + B*u */
  228     eye(R);
  229     for (i = 0; i < 1600; i++) {
  230       R[i] *= R_fakt;
  231     }
  232   
  233     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
  234       for (m = 0; m < 10; m++) {
  235         b_A[i + 10 * m] = 0.0;
  236         for (i2 = 0; i2 < 10; i2++) {
  237           b_A[i + 10 * m] += A[i + 10 * i2] * Pk[i2 + 10 * m];
  238         }
  239       }
  240     }
  241   
  242     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
  243       for (m = 0; m < 10; m++) {
  244         dist_point = 0.0;
  245         for (i2 = 0; i2 < 10; i2++) {
  246           dist_point += b_A[i + 10 * i2] * A[m + 10 * i2];
  247         }
  248   
  249         Pk[i + 10 * m] = dist_point + Q[i + 10 * m];
  250       }
  251     }
  252   
  253     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
  254       for (m = 0; m < 40; m++) {
  255         b_Pk[i + 10 * m] = 0.0;
  256         for (i2 = 0; i2 < 10; i2++) {
  257           b_Pk[i + 10 * m] += Pk[i + 10 * i2] * H[m + 40 * i2];
  258         }
  259       }
  260     }
  261   
  262     for (i = 0; i < 40; i++) {
  263       for (m = 0; m < 10; m++) {
  264         K[i + 40 * m] = 0.0;
  265         for (i2 = 0; i2 < 10; i2++) {
  266           K[i + 40 * m] += H[i + 40 * i2] * Pk[i2 + 10 * m];
  267         }
  268       }
  269     }
  270   
  271     for (i = 0; i < 40; i++) {
  272       for (m = 0; m < 40; m++) {
  273         dist_point = 0.0;
  274         for (i2 = 0; i2 < 10; i2++) {
  275           dist_point += K[i + 40 * i2] * H[m + 40 * i2];
  276         }
  277   
  278         b_H[i + 40 * m] = dist_point + R[i + 40 * m];
  279       }
  280     }
  281   
  282     mrdivide(b_Pk, b_H, K);
  283     memcpy(&b_zl[0], &zl[0], 20U * sizeof(double));
  284     for (i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
  285       b_zl[i + 20] = zr[i];
  286       b_zml[i] = zml[i];
  287     }
  288   
  289     memcpy(&b_zml[20], &zmr[0], 20U * sizeof(double));
  290     for (i = 0; i < 40; i++) {
  291       c_zl[i] = b_zl[i] - b_zml[i];
  292     }
  293   
  294     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
  295       xp[i] = 0.0;
  296       for (m = 0; m < 40; m++) {
  297         xp[i] += K[i + 10 * m] * c_zl[m];
  298       }
  299   
  300       r[i] += xp[i];
  301     }
  302   
  303     b_eye(b_A);
  304     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
  305       for (m = 0; m < 10; m++) {
  306         dist_point = 0.0;
  307         for (i2 = 0; i2 < 40; i2++) {
  308           dist_point += K[i + 10 * i2] * H[i2 + 40 * m];
  309         }
  310   
  311         b_a[i + 10 * m] = b_A[i + 10 * m] - dist_point;
  312       }
  313     }
  314   
  315     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
  316       for (m = 0; m < 10; m++) {
  317         c_a[i + 10 * m] = 0.0;
  318         for (i2 = 0; i2 < 10; i2++) {
  319           c_a[i + 10 * m] += b_a[i + 10 * i2] * Pk[i2 + 10 * m];
  320         }
  321       }
  322     }
  323   
  324     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
  325       memcpy(&Pk[10 * i], &c_a[10 * i], 10U * sizeof(double));
  326     }
  327   
  328     /* % Zustandsbegrenzungen */
  329     /*  % Kr체mmung */
  330     /*  bezogen auf Mittellinie, 0.72 entspricht einem minimalen Innenradius von 1m */
  331     for (i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
  332       if ((-0.75 >= r[i + 2]) || rtIsNaN(r[i + 2])) {
  333         r[i + 2] = -0.75;
  334       }
  335   
  336       if ((0.75 <= r[i + 2]) || rtIsNaN(r[i + 2])) {
  337         r[i + 2] = 0.75;
  338       }
  339     }
  340   
  341     /*  % y-Wert des ersten Punktes */
  342     if ((0.5 <= r[0]) || rtIsNaN(r[0])) {
  343       dist_point = 0.5;
  344     } else {
  345       dist_point = r[0];
  346     }
  347   
  348     if ((-0.5 >= dist_point) || rtIsNaN(dist_point)) {
  349       r[0] = -0.5;
  350     } else {
  351       r[0] = dist_point;
  352     }
  353   
  354     /*  % Startwinkel  */
  355     if ((0.78 <= r[1]) || rtIsNaN(r[1])) {
  356       dist_point = 0.78;
  357     } else {
  358       dist_point = r[1];
  359     }
  360   
  361     if ((-0.78 >= dist_point) || rtIsNaN(dist_point)) {
  362       r[1] = -0.78;
  363     } else {
  364       r[1] = dist_point;
  365     }
  366   
  367     /*  45째 */
  368   }
